articles.author: Andrew Wulfeck
articles.title: 20 years later: A look at the deadliest disaster to strike Earth in modern history - Fox Weather
articles.description: On Dec. 26, 2004, a 9.2-magnitude earthquake shook Southeast Asia, triggering the worst tsunami in recorded history. According to United Nations estimates, more than 220,000 people were killed, and significant damage was reported across 15 countries.
articles.content: Twenty years have now passed since a massive earthquake and subsequent tsunami devastated communities in Southeast Asia, resulting in more than 220,000 confirmed deaths and millions displaced followi… [+3433 chars]
